description: Human-readable name for the label printer profile used when generating barcode labels.
Device type or driver class for this printer (likely label/thermal); confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about this printer configuration or its intended use.
Configured label width used to size printed barcodes (unit likely inches; confirm with SME).
Configured label height used to size printed barcodes (unit likely inches; confirm with SME).
Webhook endpoint or URL used to trigger remote label printing; specifics may vary by integration; confirm with SME.
API operation or HTTP method used by the webhook when sending print jobs; confirm with SME.
IP address of the networked printer or print service gateway used for barcode jobs.
TCP port for the network printer or print service receiving barcode print requests.
Password or token used to authenticate to the web printing endpoint; treat as sensitive.
User or process that created this printer record.
Timestamp when this printer record was created (UTC unless otherwise noted).
User or process that last updated this printer record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this printer record (UTC unless noted).
Boolean flag marking this as the systemâ€™s default barcode printer for the relevant scope (e.g., site, account).
